meanings.definition: As a matter of routine; regularly
meanings.sent1: She routinely checks her email every morning.
meanings.sent2: The bus arrives routinely at 8:00 AM.
meanings.sent3: He routinely wears mismatched socks for good luck.
meanings.sent4: The sun routinely rises in the east, painting the sky with colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher routinely reminds the students to complete their homework on time.

meanings.definition: In a habitual or customary manner
meanings.sent1: They routinely walk their dog in the park every evening.
meanings.sent2: The bakery routinely sells out of fresh bread by noon.
meanings.sent3: The cat routinely knocks over the same vase every day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter routinely fills the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The old clock routinely chimes every hour, marking the passage of time.
